entity.name: board
entity.query: SELECT bgno, brdno, brdmemo, brdtitle, usernm brdwriter, LEFT(brddate, 10) brddate, RIGHT(brddate, 8) brdtime, 1 brdtype FROM TBL_BOARD TB INNER JOIN COM_USER CU ON tb.userno=cu.userno WHERE brddeleteflag='N'
entity.deltaQuery: SELECT brdno FROM TBL_BOARD WHERE brddeleteflag='N' AND brddate > '${dataimporter.last_index_time}'
entity.deltaImportQuery: SELECT bgno, brdno, brdmemo, brdtitle, usernm brdwriter, LEFT(brddate, 10) brddate, RIGHT(brddate, 8) brdtime, 1 brdtype FROM TBL_BOARD TB INNER JOIN COM_USER CU ON tb.userno=cu.userno WHERE brdno = '${dataimporter.delta.brdno}'
entity.deletedPkQuery: SELECT brdno FROM TBL_BOARD WHERE brddeleteflag='Y' AND brddeletedate > '${dataimporter.last_index_time}'

entity.name: reply
entity.query: SELECT brdno as id, reno, rememo FROM TBL_BOARDREPLY a WHERE redeleteflag='N' AND brdno='${board.brdno}'
entity.deltaQuery: SELECT reno FROM TBL_BOARDREPLY WHERE redeleteflag='N' AND redate > '${dataimporter.last_index_time}'
entity.parentDeltaQuery: SELECT brdno as id, brdno FROM TBL_BOARDREPLY WHERE reno='${reply.reno}'
entity.deltaImportQuery: SELECT brdno, reno, rememo FROM TBL_BOARDREPLY WHERE reno='${dataimporter.delta.reno}'
entity.deletedPkQuery: SELECT reno FROM TBL_BOARDREPLY WHERE redeleteflag='Y' AND redeletedate > '${dataimporter.last_index_time}'

entity.name: boardFileList
entity.query: SELECT brdno, brdno as id, fileno, filename, concat(left(realname,4), '\\',realname) realname FROM TBL_BOARDFILE WHERE brdno='${board.brdno}'
